org.apache.kudu.client

Class KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.kudu.client.AbstractKuduScannerBuilder<KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder,KuduScanner>
      • org.apache.kudu.client.KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    KuduScanner

    @InterfaceAudience.Public
 @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public static class KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder
extends AbstractKuduScannerBuilder<KuduScanner.KuduScannerBuilder,KuduScanner>
    A Builder class to build KuduScanner. Use KuduClient.newScannerBuilder(org.apache.kudu.client.KuduTable) in order to get a builder instance.

    • Method Summary
